title: canximan
author: canximan
content: It have been 4 months passed since we launched Canxium with the goal of creating a fully decentralized reliable coin and become a Demand-Driven Supply BlockChain. Offline mining is one of our main feature to separate the chain operation and coin mining from each other, so in the future we can operate the chain without mining new coins if there is no demand.Let test our offline mining and share the testing reward of 250 CAU.Offline Mining Guide: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o81-oFBCC7sWebsite: https://canxium.org

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Since when does it take so many actions to mine a coin on the ethash algorithm?I don’t understand why mining this coin on video cards, when there are already many ASICs for this algorithm.There is no information about mining on the site, and I don’t want to look for information about mining the next Ethereum fork.
